description.en:
I remember the memory of my previous life when I was abused by my father for the experiment. Then I realized. According to my previous life, this is the world of fantasy fiction I’ve read. That she was born with a minor role and died before the novel even started. Ariadne thought calmly, ‘I am screwed.’

She was also screwed on a global basis, this novel has a bad ending. The end of this 10-volume Munchkin (overpowered) fantasy novel is it was the failure of the protagonist and the destruction of the world.

---
After years of torture at the hands of her own father, young elementalist Ariadne Eldier sees her chance to escape when her mother’s untimely death prompts a visit from her grandfather, a powerful archmage. Once whisked away to safety, Aria begins her plans to not only distribute an elixir for the contamination plaguing the land, but also save the protagonist and prevent this novel’s tragic ending. But with her own fated death looming, will Aria be able to become the hero this tale needs?

---

description.uk:
У мене в голові виникнули спогади про те, як у минулому житті батько катував мене експериментами. І я зрозуміла, що народилася другорядним персонажем, який помер ще до початку розвитку дій роману жанру “фентезі”, яку прочитала у минулому житті.
Аріадна спокійно подумала. Це провал. Провал трапився ще навіть за облаштування цього світу.
"Цей роман. Тут поганий кінець."
Кінець цього фентезі роману про чарівну країну з десятьма книгами. З провалом головного героя світ було зруйновано.
Якщо головний герой воскресне, поганий кінець забезпечений. Бувають же такі новели!
Якщо вона збирається змінити кінець, то повинна врятувати і світ, і головного героя, і його друзів.
Але людина, яку вона має врятувати насамперед...
"Візьми мене з собою, дідусю!".
Це її саму, яка мала б загинути у шістнадцятирічному віці від тортур.

---

她是公爵的孩子，但是母親很有可能是被父親殺害的！要逃出公爵府才能保住自己的性命，可是，她能依靠的……只有那個看起來很冷漠的外公。

altTitles.en: Delinquent high school girl KuzuHana-chan
Yankee high school girl KuzuHana-chan

altTitles.ja: ヤンキーJKクズハナちゃん

altTitles.pt-br: Garota Delinquente Do Ensino Médio KuzuHana-chan

description.en:
At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! 

While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone.

Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.fr:
Au début de l'année scolaire, Saotome Hodaka intègre le lycée préfectoral de Moteshiro, ancien établissement réservé aux filles et récemment devenu mixte. Il découvre rapidement que le ratio garçons/filles est de 1:359 !

Bien que cela puisse sembler être un paradis pour certains, la majorité des élèves sont des délinquantes, et Saotome se retrouve aussitôt extorqué par certaines des filles les plus agressives. Par chance, il est sauvé malgré lui par Hanako Kuzuryu, une belle délinquante qui aspire seulement à être laissée en paix.

Est-ce le début d'une nouvelle amitié ? Comment la vie de Saotome évoluera-t-elle dans une école pleine de filles turbulentes ?
description.ja:
男女比率1対359!!　359人の女子高生にいじられまくり!!　つらたんハーレム学園ラブコメ!!　コワかわ最強ヒロイン爆誕!!
四方八方ギャルだらけな県立茂手城高校に入学した黒一点・早乙女穂高は、ヤンキーJK・九頭竜華子にピンチを救われて…!?
description.pt-br:
Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?!

Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.

description.en:
Wanderer, imposing, somewhere in the vast void of space, Rendezvous awaits! The only space station built inside a living being, where the best scientists, warriors, explorers and engineers of the galaxy live.
Follow the adventures of the Rendezvaj against the galaxy's major enemy; The Raccoon-race "preservation" Federation in this epic Space Opera.
description.es-la:
Errante, imponente, en algún lugar del vasto vacío espacial, Rendezvous espera! La única estación espacial construida dentro de un ser vivo, que aloja a los mejores científicos, guerreros, exploradores e ingenieros de la galaxia.
Sigue las aventuras de un grupo de Rendezvaj contra su mayor enemigo; La Federación de “Conservación” de la raza Mapache en esta épica ópera spacial.

altTitles.en: It's Not Your Child
The Baby Isn't Yours

description.en:
Callia Taxicate was a mere commoner until she saved the life of Simon Tereloane, the son of a duke. In return, the duke helps make her commander of the emperor's knights and she becomes a war hero. 

Though she only sees Simon as a friend, the two unexpectedly spend the night together and she ends up pregnant! Terrified that he and his noble family won't accept a child out of wedlock, Callia runs away to raise the baby on her own. But how long can she hide this secret, especially from the father?!
description.uk:
Калія — геройка війни та полковниця, яка поклала край минулому кровопролиттю. Але одного разу вона дізнається, що... вагітна?!
З усіх людей, батьком дитини є Саймон Терроан, її найкращий друг і архімаг, з яким Калія провела одну пристрасну ніч.
Вважаючи, що він не хоче немовля, вона приховує правду про свою вагітність, звільняється з роботи й зникає, щоб народити маля, поки Терроан був відсутній. 
Але правда в тому, що Саймон любив Калію більше, ніж будь-кого. І ось, починаються невпинні пошуки коханої.

title.en: Remote Jugyou ni Nattara Class 1 no Bishoujo to Doukyo Suru Koto ni Natta

altTitles.en: When I Got to Remote Class, I Had to Move in With the Most Beautiful Girl in My Class

altTitles.ja: リモート授業になったらクラス1の美少女と同居することになった

altTitles.es-la: Cuando empecé con las clases a distancia, tuve que convivir con la chica más guapa de mi clase.

altTitles.es: Cuando empecé con las clases a distancia, tuve que convivir con la chica más guapa de mi clase.

altTitles.tr: Uzaktan Eğitime Başladığımda, Sınıfımdaki En Güzel Kızla Aynı Eve Taşınmak Zorunda Kaldım

description.en:
High school student Kanata Yoshino who was at his wit's end, meets Haruka Hoshikawa, the most beautiful girl of his class, who was waving her smartphone alone in a park in the middle of the night. She is bad with machines and doesn't know how to connect to the internet, and asks him to help. He ends up visiting her house, but little does he know, she has a secret purpose...!

The sweet and romantic cohabitation love comedy begins with the skilled invitation of the young lady!
description.es: El estudiante de instituto Kanata Yoshino, que no sabía qué hacer, se encuentra con Haruka Hoshikawa, la chica más guapa de su clase, que estaba agitando su smartphone sola en un parque en mitad de la noche. Hoshikawa le pide ayuda porque es mala con los aparatos y no sabe conectarse a Internet. Acaba visitando su casa, pero poco sabe él, ¡ella tiene un propósito secreto...! ¡La dulce y romántica comedia de amor de convivencia comienza con la hábil invitación de la joven!
description.ja:
とある感染症が蔓延し、学生寮が閉鎖となって途方に暮れていた高校生・吉野叶多は、
夜中の公園で一人スマホを振り回すという奇行を見せるクラス1の美少女・星川遥と出会った。
機械音痴でネット接続の仕方がわからないと語る星川に助けを求められ、
家をお邪魔した吉野だったが、実は彼女には秘めた目的があって──！？
誘い受け上手なお嬢様とはじめる、イチャ甘同居ラブコメディ開幕！
description.es-la: El estudiante de instituto Kanata Yoshino, que no sabía qué hacer, se encuentra con Haruka Hoshikawa, la chica más guapa de su clase, que estaba agitando su smartphone sola en un parque en mitad de la noche. Hoshikawa le pide ayuda porque es mala con los aparatos y no sabe conectarse a Internet. Acaba visitando su casa, pero poco sabe él, ¡ella tiene un propósito secreto...! ¡La dulce y romántica comedia de amor de convivencia comienza con la hábil invitación de la joven!
description.pt-br:
O estudante do ensino médio Kanata Yoshino, que estava perdendo o juízo, conhece Haruka Hoshikawa, a garota mais bonita da sua turma, que estava agitando seu smartphone sozinha em um parque no meio da noite. Ela é ruim com máquinas e não sabe se conectar à internet, e pede ajuda a ele. Ele acaba visitando a casa dela, mas ele mal sabe que ela tem um propósito secreto...!

A doce e romântica comédia de amor de coabitação começa com o habilidoso convite da jovem!

altTitles.en: Time Slip of the Fist King

description.en:
In a world where humans enslave other races, the archmage ‘Laefenhart’ is treated as the Demon King by the humans for his sins of helping the other races. 

A group of Heroes came to subdue the Demon King! ‘Laefenhart’ succeeds in causing great damage to the Hero party, but ends up being in danger of being killed by the Fist King, ‘Tesron’…

“Space-Time Return Spell.”

The magic spell cast as a last resort miraculously succeeds and sends ‘Laefenhart’ to the past. However…

I became one of the Heroes, the Fist King, ‘Tesron’, who had the strongest body on the continent?!

The archmage ‘Laefenhart’, with his newly acquired physical strength, changes the world with new powers!

title.en: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai Shobon!

altTitles.en: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai Sho-bon!
Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai Shoobon!
Haganai Shobon!
Эх, у меня мало друзей!
僕は友達が少ない　ショボーン！

description.en: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai Shobo-n! is a spin-off of Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai written by Kazehana Chiruwo and illustrated by Shirabi. It's a collection of oneshots focusing on the members of the Neighbour's Club and their relationships with each other.

altTitles.ja: マリッジトキシン

altTitles.en: MARRIAGETOXIN

description.en:
A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.”

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to…

------
- [Official English Volumes at Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/marriage-toxin)
description.ja: <毎週水曜更新>殺し屋×結婚詐欺師の世界一ハードな婚活バトル物語！数百年続く殺し屋一族の青年・下呂。学校にも行かず裏稼業で生きてきた彼にとって女性は「苦手で縁遠いもの」であり、結婚は「するべきではないもの」と考えていた。だがある日、血が絶えることを恐れた彼の実家は、下呂が結婚し子供を残さないならば、妹に「それ」を強制することを通告。困り果てた下呂は仕事のターゲットであった結婚詐欺師に…。
description.pt-br:
Um assassino de aluguel e uma vigarista de casamentos partem na batalha mais cansativa do mundo! 

Gero é um jovem de um clã de assassinos, que existe há centenas de anos. Como alguém que nunca foi à escola e viveu sua vida lidando com o lado sombrio do negócio, ele se considera “sem perspectivas com mulheres” e o casamento é “algo que não é para ele”. No entanto, um dia, com medo de que sua linhagem se dissolva, seu clã avisa Gero que, se ele não se casar e ter um herdeiro, eles não terão escolha a não ser… forçar sua irmãzinha a fazer “isso”. Levado ao extremo, Gero pede ao alvo de seu trabalho, uma vigarista de casamento, para que...

altTitles.ja: リ・モンスター

altTitles.th: Re:Monster ราชันชาติอสูร

description.en: Tomokui Kanata has been reincarnated into the weakest race, goblin, and given a new name, Gobrou, after having undergone an unfortunate death. However, Gobrou has retained his previous life's memories and ability to learn skills from what he eats. In this alternate world of survival of the fittest, events unfold. Will a goblin party become the heroes of this world, in a delightful twist from your usual scenario?
description.pt-br: Tomokui Kanata reincarnou na raça mais fraca, a dos goblins e ganhou um novo nome, Rou, após ter morrido de forma infeliz. Entretanto, o goblin Rou preservou as lembranças de sua vida passada, ganhando uma evolução incomum, mas mantendo sua capacidade de ganhar habilidades por comê-los. Neste mundo alternativo de sobrevivência do mais forte, com o desenrolar dos acontecimentos, irá o grupo do goblins se tornarem os heróis deste mundo e o transformarem em um cenário totalmente diferente do habitual? Ele irá se tornar o herói deste mundo ou um soberano das trevas dominará a todos?

title.en: Kuchi ga Saketemo Kimi Ni Wa

altTitles.en: Even If You Slit My Mouth

altTitles.ja: 口が裂けても君には

description.en:
Miroku-san, the slit-mouth woman, is to marry high school student Kouichi to maintain her existence as his family has been in charge of upkeeping superstitions for generations. To add, there seems to be another reason that he seems more than willing…   
  
Miroku, however, would rather use her own strength than borrow that of others. Thus, they establish a contract as follows.  
1. For a trial period of a year, they are to act as though they were married.  
2. If she is able to scare him within that year, the engagement will be broken.  
 
---

*This is the three-part short story's official serialization, which began on the Shonen Jump+ website on November 10, 2020.*
description.fr:
Miroku-san, la femme à la bouche fendue, doit épouser Kouichi, un lycéen, pour maintenir son existence, car sa famille est responsable de l'entretien des superstitions depuis des générations. Pour ajouter, il semble y avoir une autre raison pour laquelle il semble plus que disposé …   
  
Miroku, cependant, préfère utiliser sa propre force plutôt que d'emprunter celle des autres. Ainsi, ils établissent un contrat comme suit.   
1. Pendant une période d'essai d'un an, ils doivent agir comme s'ils étaient mariés.   
2. Si elle parvient à lui faire peur dans l'année, l'engagement sera rompu.
description.pt-br:
Miroku-san, a mulher com a boca cortada, vai se casar com o estudante Kouichi do ensino médio para manter sua existência, já que sua família é responsável por manter superstições há gerações. Para adicionar, parece haver outra razão pela qual ele parece mais do que disposto...

Miroku, entretanto, prefere usar sua própria força do que pedir emprestada a de outros. Assim, eles estabelecem um contrato:
1. Por um período experimental de um ano, devem agir como se estivessem casados;
2. Se ela conseguir assustá-lo naquele ano, o noivado será rompido.

title.en: Ikitsuku Saki wa Yuusha ka Maou ka

altTitles.ja: 行き着く先は勇者か魔王か　元・廃プレイヤーが征く異世界攻略記

altTitles.en: Is the destination a hero or a demon king?

description.en:
“I’ve found you!”

Mamiya Yuuto was transported into another world after hearing those words, but all he got out of it were a younger body and the ability to see his status screen at any time — in overwhelming detail.

Survive in a different world with skills and magic, armed with the experience of working life and the knowledge and perseverance of a retired gamer!

altTitles.en: Noragami: Stray God

altTitles.th: โนรางามิ เทวดาขาจร

altTitles.ja: ノラガミ

description.en: Yato is a minor god whose dream is to have a lot of followers worshiping him and praying to him. Unfortunately, his dream is far from coming true since he doesn't even have a single shrine dedicated to him. To make things worse, the only partner he had to help him solve people's problems, had just quit the job. His godly existence and luck just might change when he stumbles upon Iki Hiyori in her attempt to save him from an oncoming bus; a feat which also leaves her in quite a predicament so she is stuck with him until her problem gets resolved. Together with Hiyori and his new partner-weapon Yukine, Yato will do everything he can to gain fame, recognition and just maybe, one shrine dedicated to him, as well.
description.pt: Yato é um deus menor, cujo sonho é ter um monte de seguidores adorá-lo e orar com ele. Infelizmente, o seu sonho está longe de se tornar realidade desde que ele não tem sequer um único santuário dedicado a ele. Para piorar as coisas, o único parceiro que tinha que o ajudava a resolver os problemas das pessoas, tinha acabado de sair do trabalho. Sua existência divina e a sorte só pode mudar quando ele se depara com Hiyori Iki e salva sua vida, um feito que também deixa em muito a situação para que ela está presa com ele até que seu problema é resolvido. Juntamente com Hiyori e sua nova Yukine parceiro de armas, Yato vai fazer tudo que puder para ganhar fama, reconhecimento e apenas talvez, um santuário dedicado a ele, também.
description.ru: «Бог, который может мечом отменить приговор.» В мире людей есть Бог, который может проникнуть в самое сердце человека. Когда вы грустите, когда вы устали, если вы посмотрите наверх, до самого рая, то увидите номер телефона. Но самое важное – не звонить! Если вы позвоните, перед вами появится парень, который с наглым выражением лица скажет: «Возрадуйся, я – Бог.» Если это произойдет, то что вы будете делать?
description.pt-br: Yato é um deus menor, cujo sonho é ter um monte de seguidores adorá-lo e orar com ele. Infelizmente, o seu sonho está longe de se tornar realidade desde que ele não tem sequer um único santuário dedicado a ele. Para piorar as coisas, o único parceiro que tinha que o ajudava a resolver os problemas das pessoas, tinha acabado de sair do trabalho. Sua existência divina e a sorte só pode mudar quando ele se depara com Hiyori Iki e salva sua vida, um feito que também deixa em muito a situação para que ela está presa com ele até que seu problema é resolvido. Juntamente com Hiyori e sua nova Yukine parceiro de armas, Yato vai fazer tudo que puder para ganhar fama, reconhecimento e apenas talvez, um santuário dedicado a ele, também...

altTitles.ja: 描くなるうえは

altTitles.en: Now That We Draw

description.en:
Uehara-kun, who loves 2D, dreams of becoming a comic artist one day! However, his dream is threatened when an editor rejects his work as too boring.

The next day, while contemplating giving up on his dream, a gal in his class, Miyamoto Niina, sees his manuscript, and a too-close pseudo-romance for the sake of their comics begins!?

This is a comic artists × youth romantic comedy!
description.id: Uehara-kun menyukai karakter 2 dimensi dan mempunyai cita-cita menjadi mangaka! Namun, mimpinya pupus saat seorang editor menolak manga-nya karena bikin ngantuk. Besoknya, dia berencana membuang manga yang ditolak tersebut, namun, salah satu gadis dari kelasnya, Miyamoto Niina, mengetahui manga hasil buatannya, timbulah kisah komedi-romantis yang terjalin dari sebuah manga!
description.ja:
2次元をこよなく愛する上原くんの夢は漫画家！

ある日、同じクラスのギャル宮本さんに自分の原稿を見られたことで漫画のための距離感近すぎ疑似恋愛、開始!?

漫を持して描く漫画家×青春ラブコメディ！！
description.vi:
Uehara-kun là một thằng rất thích gái 2D và ước mơ làm hoạ sĩ Manga! Tuy nhiên, giấc mơ của anh ta lại ngay lập tức bị đạp đổ khi bị một biên tập viên nhận xét rằng tác phẩm này nhìn chán chả buồn nói.

Tưởng như anh đã định từ bỏ giấc mơ của mình thì một cô gái trong lớp của anh, Miyamoto Niina, nhìn thấy bản phác thảo của cậu ấy và muốn bắt đầu một mối tình tưởng lãng mạn nhưng ai ngờ là giả tạo, để giúp cậu hoàn thành được bộ manga của mình!

Một bộ manga về Mangaka ✖ Romcom tuổi mới lớn!
description.pt-br:
Uehara-kun, que adora 2D, sonha em se tornar um mangaká um dia! No entanto, seu sonho é ameaçado quando um editor rejeita seu trabalho por considerá-lo muito chato.

No dia seguinte, enquanto pensa em desistir de seu sonho, uma garota de sua turma, Miyamoto Niina, vê seu manuscrito, e um pseudo-romance muito próximo para o bem de seus mangás começa!?

Esta é uma comédia romântica juvenil de quadrinistas!

title.en: Ochikobore Kenshi, Tsuihousareta no de Majutsushi ni Tenkou suru - Kenshi no Toki wa Gomi Skill datta "Zettai Kioku" wa Majutsushi ni Totte wa Kami Skill deshita

altTitles.ja: 落ちこぼれ剣士、追放されたので魔術師に転向する ～剣士のときはゴミスキルだった『絶対記憶』は魔術師にとっては神スキルでした～

altTitles.en: The Exiled Failed Swordsman Becomes a Sorcerer ~ [Absolute Memory], Which Was a Garbage Skill for a Swordsman, Is a God Skill for a Sorcerer!

description.en: In a world where swordsmanship and magic clash, Durandal is born into one of the world’s most prestigious swordsman families. However, his innate skill is ‘Absolute Memory’. A skill that allows him to never forget anything he has seen or heard, but it was completely useless in swordsmanship where power is everything. Eventually, the banished Durandal encounters ‘magic’, and starts to change the life he had once given up on!!

altTitles.en: Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan
The Youngest Son of a Renowned Family of Swordsmen
Youngest Son of the Renowned Swordsmanship Clan
Swordmaster's Youngest Son

altTitles.es-la: El hijo menor del maestro de la espada

description.en:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UspJjUOFrFQ)
description.ko:
진 룬칸델
대륙 최고의 검술명가, 룬칸델의 막내아들
룬칸델 역사상 최악의 둔재

비참하게 쫓겨나 허무한 최후를 맞이한 그에게
다시 한 번 기회가 주어졌다.

“너는 이 힘을 어떻게 사용하고 싶더냐?”
“저를 위해 사용하고 싶습니다.”

전생의 기억과 압도적인 재능, 그리고 신과의 계약

최강이 될 준비는 끝났다.

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UspJjUOFrFQ)

description.en: A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

description.en:
When vlogger meets top-of-the-industry writer, what could go wrong? Everything! Nothing has gone my way ever since meeting her.

Hu Luoluo, on the brink of having her vlogger account relinquished, is shoved into the path of scandal-ridden writer extraordinaire Song Li purely by accident. Being featured on hot topics, paired up as a couple, finally gaining traffic... Will it finally make her the greatest vlogger of all time?
description.es-la: Juntos o se hunden juntos, ¿se descubrirán mentiras sobre el amor? Están ligados por negocios, fingiendo ser pareja para contrarrestar los escándalos del escritor y lograr ser el primer lugar en el buscador.

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

altTitles.ja: 私の女神が今日も推せる

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi no Megami ga Kyou mo Oseru

altTitles.ja: 私の女神が今日も推せる ~これからも、いつまでも~

description.en: This is a yuri omnibus currently being serialized in the web manga magazine comicGAGA. The theme is "goddess-like woman x troubled protagonist" and it's a fun manga that you can easily read. Both the magazine and the single issue version are distributed on the first Saturday of every month. (Each episode 20 pages)
description.ja:
友達だけど、気付いたら気になっている。
目で追っていた相手と、気付いたら距離が縮んでいる。
一緒にいると嬉しいのに、苦しくなるこの気持ちは何だろう…。

description.pl: Leo Lombardi jest kierowcą wyścigowym L1 w Team Zeus. Jest młody, przystojny i ma talent do jazdy, który wzbudza zazdrość. W tym sukcesie uczestniczy również chłopak Leo, J.J., który tak się składa, że jest mechanikiem w Team Zeus. Wszystko wskazuje na to, że Leo zdobędzie mistrzostwo drugi rok z rzędu. Ale kiedy J.J. nagle zrywa z Leo, sprawy zaczynają iść na źle. Wraz z odejściem fortuny (talizmanu szczęścia) Leo, jego życie zawodowe (i osobiste) zaczyna cierpieć. Jak J.J. pozbędzie się tego małpiego rozumu w swoich planach i odzyska miano mistrza, które kiedyś miał...?

title.en: My Best Friend Who I Love Fell Completely in Love With My Vtuber Self

altTitles.ja: 大好きな親友がVチューバーの自分にガチ恋してた話

altTitles.ja-ro: Daisuki na Shinyuu ga Vtuber no Jibun ni Gachikoi shimashita Hanashi

altTitles.en: My Best Friend Is In Love With My Vtuber

description.en: Manga artist Oshiga Sukoya is in love with the Vtuber Doujima Taiga and constantly gushes about her to her best friend Hariyama Teruko. Little does Sukoya know that Teruko is a)the person behind Doujima Taiga and b) secretly in love with Sukoya.

title.en: Ore no [Kantei] Skill ga Cheat Sugite ~Densetsu no Yuusha wo Yomi "Tori" Saikyou e~

altTitles.ja: 俺の『鑑定』スキルがチートすぎて ～伝説の勇者を読み“盗り”最強へ～

altTitles.en: My [Appraisal] Skill Is Too Overpowered ~Reading and Stealing the Legendary Hero’s Skills to Become the Strongest~

description.en:
When Mel Rairoot, an orphaned boy, turned 15, he was given the unique skill of [Appraisal], which allows him to read information about people and objects. Moreover, it was an extraordinary skill that should not exist, surpassing even the legendary rank S... rank EX! 

However, since [Appraisal] can also read information about people, there is a risk that it will be targeted by criminals who want to hide their identities. Mel's life is immediately targeted, and although he somehow manages to fight back, he is now being pursued! 

Mel is forced to live on the run with Silphy, the princess of the elf country who has lost her memory, and Clara, a tiger girl. However, he makes full use of his cheat ability to brilliantly overcome many difficulties! With the "Eye of God" in his hands, the boy reads and steals the power of the legendary hero, and rises to the top!



[Webnovel link](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7932dt/)
description.ja:
天涯孤独の少年メルが15歳になって授かった固有スキルは人や物の情報を読み取る『鑑定スキル』。しかも、幻のランク“S”をも超える、存在しないはずのランク“EX”だった！

“神の眼”を手にしたメルは、記憶を失くした幼なじみ・エルフの王女シルフィ、虎人族の少女クララとともに故郷を目指す旅に出る！

altTitles.ja: バディゴ！

altTitles.en: Buddy Go!

description.en: Shizuku Ishiai, a 2nd year middle school student, loves dancing, but is bad at expressing herself, so she crossdresses and posts videos of her dances on the popular website "Smile Douga," under the alias "Ai." And she had declared the "dancing prince," Hayate, her rival. But, after a few unexpected events, and her attempts to best him, she's somehow thrown into an idol unit with him; furthermore, a MALE one?!

altTitles.th: เดอะ นิวเกท

altTitles.ja: ザ・ニュー・ゲート

description.az: "The New Gate" adlı onlayn oyunun ölüm oyununa çevrilməsi nəticəsində on minlərlə oyunçu bu oyunda ilişib qalır. Lakin ən güclü və keçmiş oyunçulardan biri olan Şinin səyləri nəticəsində bütün oyunçular oyundan çıxa bilirlər. Lakin Şin ən sonuncu bossu məğlub edib hər kəsi azad edəndə qəribə işıq görür və qəflətən özünü 500 il gələcəkdəki oyun dünyasında tapır.
description.en:
The New Gate — an online game transformed into a life-and-death struggle for its players.

Thanks to the valiant efforts of Shin, the most powerful of them all, an end to the game and freedom for everyone seemed within reach. But just moments after Shin defeats the game’s final boss, he finds himself bathed in an unknown light and transported some 500 years into the future of the in-game world!

Thrown from a simple game gone wrong into a strange new land, one young swordsman of unrivalled strength is about to embark on a legendary journey!
description.es: "THE NEW GATE", un juego online que se había convertido en un juego de la muerte, ahora estaba liberando a las decenas de miles de jugadores que habían sido arrastrados, gracias a los esfuerzos de Shin, uno de los jugadores más antiguos. Pero después de haber derrotado al último jefe y liberado a todos, fue tragado por una luz extraña y se encontró dentro del mundo del juego 500 años en el futuro.
description.ja:
数万人を巻き込んでデスゲームと化したオンラインゲーム「THE NEW GATE（ザ・ニューゲート）」は、最古参プレイヤー・シンの活躍によりついに解放のときを迎えようとしていた。しかし最後のボスを倒し脱出することができたと思った瞬間、
突如未知の光を浴び、500年後のゲーム世界に飛ばされてしまう！最強プレイヤーの新たなる無双バトル伝説開幕！

[Video Preview](https://youtu.be/YyB2MNkrpfw)
description.ru: «Новые Врата» — смертельная игра, которая не отпускает десятки тысяч игроков. Шин — как раз один из таких геймеров. Он побеждает последнего босса и освобождает всех людей из смертельной ловушки, но самого его охватывает яркий свет и он переносится на 500 лет вперед.
description.th:
[THE NEW GATE] เกมแนว VRMMO-RPG
ซึ่งกลายเป็นเดธเกมนั้นได้มาถึงช่วงเวลา
แห่งการปลดปล่อย
เพราะความพยายามของเพลเยอร์ (ผู้เล่น)
ที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุดนามว่า ชิน
ทว่า ทันทีที่เขาโค่นมอนสเตอร์ตัวสุดท้ายลง
อยู่ๆ ประตูที่อยู่ด้านในสุดก็เปิดออก และทำให้ชิน
ซึ่งอาบแสงปริศนาที่สาดส่องเข้ามาหมดสติไป—
เมื่อเขาลืมตาตื่นขึ้นมาอีกครั้ง ก็ปรากฏภาพ
ของโลกของ [THE NEW GATE]
ที่กลายเป็นของจริงขึ้นมา...!!
description.tr: "The New Gate", oyuncularını tuzağa düşüren ve bir ölüm oyununa dönüşen çevrimiçi bir oyundur ve en güçlü oyunculardan biri olan Shin'in çabaları sayesinde oyunu sürüklenen binlerce oyuncuyu serbest bırakmaktadır. Ancak son patronu yendikten ve herkesi özgür bıraktıktan sonra, tuhaf bir ışık tarafından yutulmuş ve kendini oyun dünyasında 500 yıl sonrasında, oradan çıkamayan bir durumda bulmuştur.
description.es-la: "THE NEW GATE", un juego online que se había convertido en un juego de la muerte, ahora estaba liberando a las decenas de miles de jugadores que habían sido arrastrados, gracias a los esfuerzos de Shin, uno de los jugadores más antiguos. Pero después de haber derrotado al último jefe y liberado a todos, fue tragado por una luz extraña y se encontró dentro del mundo del juego 500 años en el futuro.

altTitles.en: A Certain Magical Index

altTitles.ja: とある魔術の禁書目録

description.ar:
تدور أحداث القصة في عالم حيث توجد قوى خارقة للطبيعة من العلم، ويوجد السحر من الدين  
  
في القصة، توما كاميجو هو طالب عادي في الثانوية بدرجات دراسية فظيعة وقوة تسمى كاسرة الأوهام. يمكن لـ كاسرة الأوهام إبطال أي قوة أخرى، لكنها تقوض أيضًا حظ كاميجو الجيد.   
.إن قوة كاسرة الأوهام الهائلة لا تُوصف حرفياً، لذا فإن كاميجو المسكين مصنّف في المستوى من ذوي المستوى صفر  
يصادف أنه قابل فتاة برداء أبيض تتدلى من شرفة نافذته. تقول الفتاة أن السَّحرةَ يطاردونها، ويكتشف كاميجو أن الفتاة هي راهبة في كنيسة إنجلترا التي استبدلت ذكرياتها بالقُوَّةِ ليتصبح "فهرس الكتُب المحرّمة" الـ .103,000 للكنيسة
description.en:
The story is set in a world where supernatural powers exist through science, and magic exists through religion.  
  
In the story, Touma Kamijou is an ordinary high school boy with terrible academic scores and a power called Imagine Breaker. Imagine Breaker can defeat any other power, but it also undermines Kamijou's own good luck. His Imagine Breaker's immense strength is literally immeasurable, so hapless Kamijou is listed at the supernatural level of 0. He happens to meet a girl in white hanging off his window balcony. The girl says she is being chased by sorcerers, and Kamijou learns that the girl is a Church of England nun whose memories have been forcibly replaced by Index-Librorum-Prohibitorum — the 103,000 forbidden texts of the Church.
description.ru:
Действие разворачивается в параллельном мире, где наука сплавлена с магией, и сверхъестественные способности давно никого не удивляют. Их носители делятся на две категории: эсперов, которые в результате направленной мутации получили один, пусть и мощный дар, и магов, которые могут быть слабее, но диапазон возможностей у них куда шире. Юных эсперов со всей Японии собирают в единый образовательный центр – город под названием Академия. Там и учится главный герой сериала Камидзё Тома. Дар у парня весьма странный: его правая рука – универсальный негатор, то есть, обнуляет любое парафизическое, магическое или божественное воздействие. А раз так, считает Тома, то и немногие крупицы счастья, посылаемые судьбой, до него просто не доходят, и вся его жизнь – полная невезуха (его любимая фраза). То на телефон наступит, то не с теми парнями свяжется, то обнаружит на перилах собственного балкона на редкость милое и голодное юное создание в костюме монашки…  
  
Адаптация ранобэ Toaru Majutsu no Index от Камати Кадзумы.|
description.pt-br: A história se passa em uma cidade acadêmica tecnologicamente avançada localizada na região oeste de Tóquio, onde alunos cientificamente avançados chamados "espers" estudam e desenvolvem habilidades especiais cuja fonte é a mente humana. Touma Kamijou é um estudante da Academia da Cidade cuja habilidade, a Imagine Breaker, possui o poder de anular quaisquer outros poderes usando sua mão direita, mas esse poder faz com que sua sorte também seja anulada, fazendo com que seja alvo de diversas furadas e problemas de azar. Um dia ele encontra uma jovem pendurada na grade de sua varanda...

altTitles.en: Six People on Crosses

altTitles.ja: 十字架のろくにん

altTitles.en: Cross of Six Men

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

altTitles.ja: 「ツキウタ。」劇場版RABBITS KINGDOM THE MOVIE

altTitles.en: "Tsukiuta." The Movie RABBITS KINGDOM THE MOVIE

description.en:
—A certain winter day.
Mutsuki Hajime, the leader of the idol unit “Six Gravity,” (a.k.a. Gravi) associated with Tsukino Talent Productions, aimlessly dropped by a secondhand bookstore and encountered Shimotsuki Shun, the leader of their sibling unit “Procellarum” (a.k.a. Procella). The two of them reached out to the antique classic which was thought to be the original work of the stageplay they would be starring in.
“Rabbits Kingdom”—
Though it should have been his first time hearing the title, a strange bothersome sensation befell him, almost as if it were stuck in the back of his head. To the perplexed Hajime, Shun gently smiled. “......Ah, this is... quite a nostalgic and beloved... story of us from another world.”
This is an “if -what if-“ world – a story of a kingdom in some other world.

„Ten świat nikomu nie pomoże. Dlatego podążyłem tą ścieżką. Aby przeżyć.”  
Jedno zabójstwo, dwóch prawie sobie obcych nastolatków. Aby zmienić przeznaczenie, wyruszyli w podróż, która wszystkiego dopełniła, choć inaczej, niż którykolwiek z nich się spodziewał.

title.en: They Wish to Take Away My Child

altTitles.en: I'm Trying to Steal Even The Child of The Terminally Ill

altTitles.es-la: Están tratando de robar incluso al hijo de una enferma terminal

description.en: “Are you going to leave your child with a terminally ill mother?”The future that the magic mirror, a relic from my parents, showed me was horrifying. A future where I would be a terminally ill mother and my husband’s mistress would demand that I leave my child behind. We’re not even married yet, so maybe we can avoid that unhappy future. You, who resemble the cold snowy fields of the north, cannot hold me. So why are your eyes so hot as you look at me as we speak of parting?”When the old duke dies, we will part ways.””If we don’t have kids, we’ll be fine, right? So don’t even think about divorce. Just stay by my side.”I felt the warmth of your lips on mine as you carefully moved closer. But the deep kiss was just the beginning of a long night ahead.

title.en: Charming the Duke of the North

altTitles.en: I Seduced the Northern Duke

altTitles.fr: Je vais séduire le Duc du Nord

altTitles.ja: 北部公爵を誘惑します

altTitles.vi: Kế hoạch là quyến rũ công tước phương bắc

description.en:
"Pretend to be my lover and join the social circle."

Selena, the top star that had the entire world's attention, was suddenly warped to Northern Duke's land during an accident while filming. Kalcion, the Northern Duke that saved her from the infernal beasts, offers Selena a chance to go back home in return for collecting information in various social circles by pretending to be his lover. Selena quickly accepts Kalcion's offer, but… 

"Why in the world can't you do this!?"

 "Don't you think that the answer to that should be obvious to you, the actress, not to me, the duke?"

There was a critical problem. The Northern Duke's acting skills are horrible!

"…Let's change the plan. I'll seduce you instead."

And thus the contractual relationship between the two started. Will Kalcion's acting skill improve first, or will he start to have true feelings for Selena instead?

---
Rinha, Korea's most beloved actress, gets into an accident while on set. When she regains consciousness, she realizes she has traveled to the Kingdom of Iklein and meets the northern duke Calcion, who saves her from a demonic beast. Calcion asks her to be his fake lover so she can get into socialite and discover the conspiracy happening in his castle.

---

description.fr:
«Prétendre être mon amant et rejoindre le cercle social.»

Selena, la top star qui avait l'attention du monde entier, a soudainement atterrit dans le pays du Duc du Nord lors d'un accident de tournage. Kalcion, le duc du Nord qui l'a sauvée des bêtes infernales, offre à Selena une chance de rentrer chez elle en échange de la collecte d'informations dans divers cercles sociaux en prétendant être son amant. Selena accepte rapidement l'offre de Kalcion, mais...

«Pourquoi diable ne pouvez-vous pas pas faire ça?»

«Ne pensez-vous pas que la réponse à cette question devrait être évidente pour vous, l'actrice, et non pour moi, le duc?»

Il y avait un problème crucial. Les compétences d'acteur du Duc du Nord étaient horribles!

«...Changeons de plan. Je vais vous séduire à la place.»

Et c'est ainsi que la relation contractuelle entre les deux commença. Le talent d'acteur de Kalcion va-t-il s'améliorer en premier, ou va-t-il commencer à éprouver de vrais sentiments pour Selena?

---
Selena, une super star sous les feux de la rampe, se retrouve par accident sur les terres du Duc du Nord alors qu'elle était en plein tournage. Kalcion, le duc, la sauve des bêtes sauvages qui la menacent et lui offre une chance de retourner dans son monde. En échange, elle doit se faire passer pour sa petite amie et glaner des informations sur les réseaux sociaux. Selena accepte la proposition du duc, mais le Duc du Nord est un très mauvais acteur. Selena se met donc en tête de le séduire pour que la réalité rattrappe la fiction et que leur relation paraisse vraisemblable.

---

Все внимание мира было приковано к главной звезде, Селене, которая в результате катастрофы в процессе съемок случайно попала на территории Северного Герцога. Спасенная от зверей-демонов Кальционом, Северным Герцогом, она получает от него предложение предоставлять ему информацию из разных светских кругов в качестве его мнимой любовницы. В обмен он вернет ее домой. Недолго думая, Селена соглашается, но что ждет ее дальше…

description.uk:
Селена, головна зірка, яка привернула увагу всього світу, раптово потрапила на землю Північного Герцога потрапив у аварію під час зйомок. Кальціон, північний герцог, який врятував її від божевільних звірів, пропонує Селені шанс повернутися додому в обмін на збір інформації в різних соціальних колах, прикидаючись його коханою. Селена швидко приймає пропозицію Кальціона, але… «Чому ви самі не можете цього зробити!?» «Чи не здається вам, що відповідь на це має бути очевидною для вас, акторки, а не для мене, герцога?» Виникла критична проблема. Акторські здібності північного герцога жахливі! «…Давайте змінимо план. Натомість я спокушу вас». І таким чином між ними почалися договірні відносини. Чи покращиться акторська майстерність Кальціона, чи натомість він почне відчувати справжні почуття до Селени?

description.vi:
Seolena, nữ minh tinh xinh đẹp hàng đầu thế giới. Một ngày nọ, khi đang quay phim thì cô bất ngờ gặp tai nạn.
Khi mở mắt ra thì đã ở một thế giới khác và chạm mặt với công tước phương Bắc. Để có thể sống sót, Seolena đã ký hợp đồng với công tước Kalcion.
Kalcion sẽ giúp cô trở về thế giới của mình, còn cô sẽ đóng giả làm người yêu hắn, giúp hắn tìm ra mối đe doạ đằng sau mình.
Nhưng…diễn xuất của công tước thật tệ hại. Cô đành phải quyến rũ công tước vậy. Sau nhiều chuyện xảy ra, ánh mắt của công tước nhìn cô trở nên khác thường.
Phải chăng diễn xuất của công tước đã tiến bộ hay thật sự có cảm tình với cô rồi…?

description.pt-br:
“Finja ser minha amante e participe dos círculos sociais.”

Selena, uma estrela que atraiu a atenção do mundo todo, repentinamente foi parar nas terras do Duque do Norte após um acidente durante as filmagens. 

Kalcion, o Duque do Norte, que a salvou de bestas infernais, oferece a ela chance de voltar para casa em troca de coletar informações em vários círculos sociais, fingindo ser sua amante. 

Selena aceitou rapidamente a oferta de Kalcion, mas…

“Por que diabos você não consegue fazer isso?!”

“Não acha que a resposta deveria ser óbvia para você a atriz, e não para mim, o duque?”

Surgiu um problema crítico. 

As habilidades de atuação do duque são terríveis!

“… Vamos mudar o plano. Em vez disso, vou seduzi-lo.”

E assim, a relação contratual entre os dois começou.

A habilidade de atuação de Kalcion irá melhorar primeiro, ou ele começará a ter sentimentos verdadeiros por Selena?

description.en: Tired of being picked on, Yeongha, the new transfer student, decides to fight back… and discovers he can pack a punch. He soon becomes the top of the food chain, savoring his new title as the toughest guy at school. But he meets his match when Suho Kang, the Champion of the PVP games, single-handedly takes down him and his crew. To earn back his honor, Yeongha decides to join the PVP games. Will he finally get the satisfaction of beating Suho up? Or will he gain something more?
description.tr: Okula yeni transfer olan Yeongha, sürekli olarak kendisinin ve arkadaşlarının zorbalığa uğramasından bıkmıştı. Bu duruma karşı koymak için kararlılıkla harekete geçti ve kendi elinin ne kadar ağır olduğunu keşfetti. Kısa sürede, okulda ki herkesi ezerek en güçlü çocuk ünvanının tadını çıkardı. Ancak PVP oyunlarının şampiyonu Suho Kang, onun ve ekibinin karşısına tek başına çıktığında, Yeongha gerçek gücünün sınırlarını anlamak zorunda kaldı. Onurunu ve Ünvanını geri kazanmak için PVP oyunlarına katılmaya karar veren Yeongha, sonunda Suho’yu yenmeyi başarabilecek midir?

title.en: The Wicked Girl Is Arriving Tonight

altTitles.en: Here Comes the Villainess

description.en: If Lixing unexpectedly received the abuse residue and becomes stronger, she can absorb the decomposition value and strengthen her attributes, and clean up the messes and women who ruined her family in the past life! The evil woman, who had been fighting everywhere with her golden arm, only to find herself in a strange situation: A hundred million dollars worth of medical professionals were scrambling to carry her school bag. The Face of the World: The Three Golden Film Awards? Top gangster turns a wolf into a dog and asks to pat his head? Imperial business tycoon Dieying tried to tear up her clothes, but she still had ten to one.

title.en: It's Okay If You Don't Have a Male Lead

altTitles.en: It's Okay if There's No Male Lead

altTitles.th: จะเป็นไรไปถ้าไร้พระเอก

altTitles.id: I'm Okay Even Without a Male Lead

altTitles.ja: 男主人公がいなくても大丈夫

altTitles.es-la: Está Bien Incluso Si No Hay Un Protagonista Masculino

description.en:
Once I dreamed of marrying the person I love.  But all this is a thing of the past.  Because now I'm not interested in things like love.  I know that in the world, dating, marriage, and things like that are taken for granted.  But now I have more important things to do.  world peace.  To defeat demons, save lives and bring peace to our beautiful empire and this world.  I don't have time to waste on love games because I'm busy working hard for the cause.  "Come with me, Chelsea."  But why does my ex-fiancé, the Seventh Prince, who has already broken off my engagement, keep flirting around me?

---
When she was young, Chelsea set all her hopes, dreams, and efforts into achieving the perfect love with her perfect fiancé. However, she later learned that he wasn’t in love with her. Rather than let her world come crumbling down, she was determined to find something else to put her effort into. And that was when she remembered she was a pretty great summoner...

title.en: Keikenchi Chochiku de Nonbiri Shoushin Ryokou ~Yuusha to Koibito ni Tsuihou sareta Senshi no Mujikaku zama~

altTitles.ja: 経験値貯蓄でのんびり傷心旅行 ～勇者と恋人に追放された戦士の無自覚ざまぁ～

altTitles.en: A Warrior Exiled by the Hero and His Lover

description.en:
After losing his girlfriend to a brave hero, Toru is expelled from his S-Rank party. With a feeling of sadness and pain in his heart, he defeats a demon he meets outside the city, and his ability [to save experience] is broken! Toru becomes level 300 in the blink of an eye! With this power that far surpasses that of heroes, there is nothing that can stop him. Kaede, a slave he met on his journey, forms a group called the "Manyu Brigade", and easily completes dungeons, acquires the legendary sacred weapons, and thanks to his skills, his friends level up easily! He rescued a countess who was attacked by bandits on the road, and befriended a legendary beast. Oru's journey continues at a leisurely pace, as he repeatedly encounters various people along the way, while his former party of heroes are deprived of opportunities to play an active role and fall into decline. This is the beginning of the life of a 300 level warrior!  


---

[Original Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9483ge/)

RENAISSANCE, LIFE, DEATH, ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.
RENAISSANCE, LIFE, DEATH, ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.
RENAISSANCE, LIFE, DEATH, ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.

All beings in the firmament live locked in this infinite cycle. Or so it was until the day they came down from the heavens.

Humanity ceased to be human. Death is no longer the end. Enlightenment came to save her children and defeat the most powerful feeling that consciousness had been able to create.

___

SpaceDrum shows us a society that has evolved to a state of full well-being, freed from wars and conflicts, in search of Nirvana, thanks to the spiritual guidance of an alien race.
The aryas are an elite group charged with the external security of the planet and the protection of the high priestess.

They are chosen because, thanks to their control over their Virya, they are able to control mysterious fragments, the shards. Reda is a student at one of the most distinctive military academies, but he has difficulty controlling his special shard due to constant visions of a strange young woman. And this will not be the biggest of your problems...

title.en: Sexy Commando Side Story: You're So Cool, Masaru!

altTitles.ja-ro: Sexy Commander Gaiden Sugoi yo!! Masaru-san

altTitles.ja: セクシーコマンドー外伝 すごいよ！！マサルさん

description.en:
The story revolves around Wakame High School's extracurricular club, "Sexy Commando Club," which consists of 5-6 male members (one being the high school principal himself), a female manager, and a small mysterious pet (that may be extraterrestrial in origin).  
  
The strange and ancient art of Sexy Commando (the roots of which extend back into Japan's Muromachi period) is a martial one; however, instead of focusing on how to defeat an opponent with punches, kicks, or grappling, it focuses on how to distract the opponent. The logic follows that any distracted opponent is unable to fight, and therefore the art of Sexy Commando trumps any other form of martial arts.  
  
There are as many techniques as there are ways to distract, though Wakame High School's Sexy Command Club tends to favor the unzipping of the trousers (Elize no Yuutsu).

title.en: Onna Chara de Isekai Teni shite Cheatppoi kedo Zako Chara na no de Medatazu Heiwa na Shomin wo Mezashimasu!

altTitles.ja: 女キャラで異世界転移してチートっぽいけど雑魚キャラなので目立たず平和な庶民を目指します！

altTitles.ja-ro: Onna Chara de Isekai Ten'i shite Cheatppoi kedo Zako Chara na no de Medatazu Heiwa na Shomin o Mezashimasu!

altTitles.en: After Reincarnating in Another World as My Sort of Cheat but Small Fry Female Character I will Strive to Live a Peaceful Life of an Ordinary Person!

altTitles.hu: Olyan Női Karakterként Kerülök Egy Másik Világba, Akinek Ugyan Vannak Különleges Képességei, De Mivel Egy Jelentéktelen Karakter Vagyok, Megpróbálok Nem Feltűnni És Békés Hétköznapi Életet Élni!

description.en: A little weary salaryman. One day, after waking up… he found himself in another world in the body of a female character, Susie, from the MMORPG he liked to play. Confused, he tried an attack… and made all the monsters flee to the place people live, afraid of his destructive power that’s able to smash a mountain. Having dealt with them, he ended up saving Howard, a local tribune who invited his savior to the village, but…
description.es: Un asalariado un poco cansado. Un día, tras despertarse... se encontró en otro mundo en el cuerpo de un personaje femenino, Susie, del MMORPG al que le gustaba jugar. Confundido, intentó un ataque... e hizo que todos los monstruos huyeran al lugar donde vive la gente, temerosos de su poder destructivo, capaz de aplastar una montaña. Tras enfrentarse a ellos, acabó salvando a Howard, un magistrado local que había invitado a su héroe al pueblo, pero...
description.hu:
Egy kimerült irodai dolgozó. Egy nap, amikor felébred, azt veszi észre, hogy egy másik világba került, és abban a női karakterben van, amelyet az általa játszott online játékban használt, Suzy néven. Bár kezdetben össze van zavarodva, támadásai hatalmas pusztító erővel bírnak, olyannyira, hogy még a hegyek alakját is megváltoztatja, és veszélyes vadállatokat űz a közeli faluba. Miközben segít Howardnak, a falusiak védelmezőjének, a vadállatok elleni küzdelemben, meghívást kap a faluba. Azonban...

Egy 32 éves férfi... egy online játék világában lánnyá válva próbál boldogulni!? Célja egy egyszerű, békés élet megteremtése a falusi környezetben. A kaland most kezdődik!
description.ja:
お疲れ気味のサラリーマン。ある日、目が覚めると...やりこんでいたネットゲームの女キャラ・スージィの姿で異世界転移していた。とまどいながらも攻撃を放つと...なぜか山の形を変えてしまうほどの破壊力で、人里のほうに魔獣を散らしてしまう。そしてその対処をしていた護民官ハワードを助けたことをきっかけに、村に招かれることになるのだが――。

32歳のおっさんが...ネトゲの世界で女の子として生きていく!? 目指せ庶民派スローライフ、開幕!!
description.es-la: Un asalariado un poco cansado. Un día, tras despertarse... se encontró en otro mundo en el cuerpo de un personaje femenino, Susie, del MMORPG al que le gustaba jugar. Confundido, intentó un ataque... e hizo que todos los monstruos huyeran al lugar donde vive la gente, temerosos de su poder destructivo, capaz de aplastar una montaña. Tras enfrentarse a ellos, acabó salvando a Howard, un magistrado local que había invitado a su héroe al pueblo, pero...
description.pt-br: Um assalariado um pouco cansado. Um dia, ao acordar… ele se viu em outro mundo no corpo de uma personagem feminina, Susie, do MMORPG que ele gostava de jogar. Confuso, ele tentou um ataque… e fez todos os monstros fugirem para o lugar onde as pessoas vivem, com medo de seu poder avassalador que é capaz de destruir uma montanha. Depois disso, ele acabou salvando Howard, um tribuno local que convidou seu salvador para a vila, mas…

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.ja-ro: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

description.en:
A HEAVENLY ENCOUNTER!
Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!

*Adapted from the Light Novel with the same name, 
Serialized in Square Enix Web Magazine [Gangan Online](https://www.ganganonline.com/title/1480)*
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

description.es-la: Park Shinwoo, CEO del Grupo Taehan. Un hombre perfecto con toda la apariencia, la riqueza y las habilidades. No le importaba quién era porque no le daba mucha importancia al matrimonio. En ese sentido, la hija mayor del grupo Sewoon, Song Eunseo, fue su mejor partido. Ella sería su “socia comercial”. Pero poco a poco se ve más y más atraído por ella… “¿Qué sentiste cuando me besaste?” Shinwoo está cada vez más desesperado por su pareja, quien era solo un negocio. Esto era claramente peligroso.

altTitles.en: The Orphanage's Tamer

altTitles.ja: 孤児院テイマー

description.ar:
بعد أن أعيد إحيائه في عالم آخر لموته بسبب كبر العمر، بطل قصتنا "شو" يعيش الآن في ميتم فقير، فيقرر المغامرة كل يوم لأجل مساعدة الميتم، ولتوفير الأكل لأخته وأصدقائه، بالإستعانة بالمهارات التي اكتسبها .  
والآن يعيش حياة عادية هو والبقية ووحوشه الظريفة.
description.en:
Shu, who died of old age, reincarnated as a baby in a different world where he was picked up by a poor orphanage. He quickly grows up under the watchful eye of the gentle director and staff. With skills received from God, he starts to exert talent…
He now lives at his own pace, adventuring with cute monsters and good friends ♪

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5081ed/) (jp)

altTitles.ja: アライブ

description.en:
Hondo Akira was shot to death by the U.S. military for a crime he did not commit. However, he somehow survived and became a teacher at a girls’ high school. 

The objective of his assignment to this school? The key to that is in the hands of Tsukishima Hibiki, an ordinary high school girl in the art club… 

The story accelerates as Hondo, an out-of-the-ordinary egoistic gentleman, gets involved in his surroundings.
description.ja:
無実の罪を着せられ、米軍に射殺されたはずの男・本堂 明。しかし彼は生き永らえ女子高の教師となっていた。

彼がこの学校に赴任した目的とは？その鍵は美術部の普通の女子高生 月島 響が握っている―？

紳士なようで唯我独尊、規格外の男・本堂が周囲を巻き込み物語は加速していく。

altTitles.en: Different World Adventures Of A Lone Japan Ground Self Defense Force Ensign

altTitles.ja: ぼっち自衛官の異世界奮戦記

description.en: Jinguji Jo, an officer candidate of the Self-Defense Force, who had just graduated from the University of Defense, was reincarnated into a different world due to a traffic accident. The inventory had the standard equipment of the Japan Ground Self-Defense Force! Jinguji Jo's self-defense officer battle action makes him unrivaled in the fantasy world with equipment stronger than magic!!
description.ja: 防大を卒業したばかりの自衛隊幹部候補生・神宮司丈は交通事故により異世界へ転生。インベントリーにはなんと陸上自衛隊標準装備品が揃っていた！　ファンタジー世界を魔法よりも強い装備で無双するジングージ・ジョーの自衛官バトルアクション！！
description.pt-br: Jinguji Jo, um candidato à Força de Autodefesa, que acabou de se formar, reencarnou em um mundo diferente por causa de um acidente no trânsito. Jinguji Jo ganha a habilidade "inventário", onde permite guardar qualquer coisa, assim ele percebe que seu equipamento da força de autodefesa está lá. A ação de Jinguji Jo neste novo mundo é imprescindível, combatendo criaturas fantasiosas com equipamentos mais poderosos que a própria magia!!!

altTitles.en: Country of Jewels
Land of the Lustrous

altTitles.ja: 宝石の国

description.az: Cəvahiratlar ölkəsi (Houseki no Kuni), meteoritlərin altı dəfə Yerə düşdüyü və bu prosesdə onu məhv etdiyi uzaq gələcəkdə baş verir. Demək olar ki, bütün canlılar məhv oldu, qalan bütün torpaqlar tək bir sahilə çevrildi. Çox uzun zaman dilimləri ərzində həsas həyat forması olan yeni bir irq yarandı; insan şəklini alan ölməz zinət əşyaları. Fosfofillit (Phos) zəifdir (ən aşağı sərtliklərdən birinə malikdir) və həmyaşıdları tərəfindən yararsız hesab edilir. Phos'a təbiət tarixinin ensiklopediyasını yaratmaq tapşırığı verildikdən sonra o, uzaq, lakin müdrik həmkarı Kinovarın (Cinnabar) köməyinə müraciət edir, beləliklə onların dostluğu və şəxsi inkişafı başlayır. Eyni zamanda “Cəvahirat camaatı” onun dəbdəbəli dəyərindən yararlanmaq istəyən Aydan gələnlərlə (aylılarla) müharibə aparır.
description.en: In the distant future, a new life form called Houseki (gems) are born. The 28 Houseki must fight against the moon dwellers who want to attack them and turn them into decorations, thus each gem is assigned a role such as a fighter or a medic. Though they hope to fight the moon dwellers, Phos is a gem who is given no assignment until the gems' master Adamantine asks them to write an encyclopedia.

title.en: Doumo, Yuusha no Chichi desu. 〜Kono Tabi wa Gusoku ga Gomeiwaku wo Kakete, Moushiwake Arimasen〜

altTitles.ja: どうも、勇者の父です。～この度は愚息がご迷惑を掛けて、申し訳ありません。～

altTitles.ja-ro: Doumo, yuusha no chichi desu. Kono tabi wa gusoku ga gomeiwaku wo kakete, moushiwake arimasen. ~Osananajimi no iinazuke wo sute, sokora de suki houdai yatteru musuko wo bunnaguru tame ni tabi ni demasu. Ima sara ayamatte mo mou osoi~

altTitles.ja: どうも、勇者の父です。この度は愚息がご迷惑を掛けて、申し訳ありません。 〜幼馴染みの許嫁を捨て、そこらで好き放題やってる息子をぶん殴るために旅に出ます。今更謝ってももう遅い〜

altTitles.en: Hello, I'm The Hero's Father ～I'm Sorry For All The Trouble My Foolish Son Has Caused You～

Hello, I Am the Hero’s Father. I Am Sorry for the Trouble My Stupid Son Has Caused. 〜I’m Going on a Journey To Beat Up My Son, Who Has Abandoned His Childhood Fiance and Is Doing Whatever He Wants Out There. Even if He Apologizes Now, It’s Already Too Late~

description.en:
Croix, who works as a lumberjack in a remote village, spends peaceful days with his beautiful wife, Wiel, and his only son, Alka. 

One day, Alka receives an oracle that he is the only one who can defeat the Demon King, the "Hero", and together with his fiancé Saya, he sets out on a journey to subjugate the Demon King... I spent my days as a lumberjack with pride. 

However, one day, three years after receiving the oracle, Saya returned to the village in tatters. 

From Saya's mouth, we are told about how Alka is failing in his authority as a hero, and is told that he does whatever he pleases without saving the world... to wake up his stupid son. Spank him with your strongest fist!!

title.en: Osananajimi ga Hisabisa ni Saikai Shitara Otagai Kyonyuu ni Natteta

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染が久々に再会したらお互い巨乳になってた

altTitles.en: Long-Lost Pals Living Their Breast Life

altTitles.ja-ro: Osananajimi ga Hisabisa ni Saikai Shitara Otagai Kyonyuu ni Natteta

description.en: Shun-kun returns to his hometown, only to find that his childhood friend has become… rather well endowed…
description.pt-br: Shun-kun retorna à sua cidade natal, apenas para descobrir que seu amigo de infância se tornou... bastante bem dotado...

title.en: Enma no Hanayome to Kimetsukerareta Fukou na Ore no Jinsei Keikaku

altTitles.en: Bride of Enma

altTitles.ja: えんまの花嫁と決めつけられた不幸な俺の人生計画

description.en: Onizaki Teppei is a high school freshman who just wants to live a plain student life, but his world is rudely shaken by a mysterious girl, Mitogawa Enma, who declares her intent to find a fiance at the school!

title.en: The Lecture You Would Never Want Your Parents To Give You

altTitles.ja: 親に絶対されたくない説教

altTitles.ja-ro: Oya ni Zettai sa Retakunai Sekkyou

altTitles.fr: Le sermon que vous ne voudriez jamais recevoir de vos parents

altTitles.ru: Лекция, которую вы бы не хотели услышать от родителей

altTitles.vi: Bài Thuyết Giáo mà ta Không bao giờ Muốn nghe từ phụ Huynh

altTitles.es-la: El regaño que nunca quisieras recibir de tus padres
La charla que nunca quieres que te den tus padres.

altTitles.ja: レッド

description.en:
Set in nineteenth-century America, Red is the last living survivor of a Native American tribe that was slaughtered by white men. On a long journey in search of revenge, he travels with Iero Ito, a samurai who ran away to America after being defeated in the Seinan civil war, and Angie, a mysterious prostitute. The bonds of friendship between the three are touching. Although it is all fiction, the story seems very real as it is based on actual battles between US troops, Apaches and other tribes.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics (2005)
description.pt-br: Situado na América do século 19, Red é o último sobrevivente vivo de uma tribo nativa americana que foi massacrada por homens brancos. Em uma longa jornada em busca de vingança, ele viaja com Iero Ito, um samurai que fugiu para a América após ser derrotado na guerra civil de Seinan, e Angie, uma misteriosa prostituta. Os laços de amizade entre os três são comoventes. Embora seja tudo ficção, a história parece muito real, pois é baseada em batalhas reais entre tropas americanas, apaches e outras tribos.

title.en: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask

altTitles.ja: ゼルダの伝説 ムジュラの仮面

altTitles.ja-ro: Zelda no Densetsu - Majora no Kamen

description.en: Based off the popular N64 game. Looking for a old friend in the lost woods, Link soon finds himself thrown into a parallel world by the mischievous actions of a possessed Skull Kid. Link finds a land in grave danger. The dark power of a relic called Majora's Mask has wreaked havoc on the citizens of Termina, but their most urgent problem is a suicidal moon crashing toward the world. Link has only 72 hours to find a way to stop its descent.
description.pt-br:
Lançado em 2000, é também uma adaptação da popular sequência de Ocarina of Time.

História: Procurando por um velho amigo na floresta perdida, Link logo se vê jogado em um mundo paralelo pelas ações maliciosas de um Skull Kid possuído. Link encontra uma terra em grave perigo. O poder sombrio de uma relíquia chamada Majora's Mask causou estragos nos cidadãos de Termina, mas seu problema mais urgente é uma lua suicida caindo em direção ao mundo. Link tem apenas 72 horas para encontrar uma maneira de parar sua descida.

Obs: O último capítulo inclui uma especulação do artista, de onde a Majora's Mask se originou.

title.en: Nagahama To Be, or Not To Be

altTitles.ja: 長浜To Be, or Not To Be

description.en: Nagisa may look like a delinquent, but he's just a typical teen trying to figure out what to do with his life. Nagisa's best friend, Issa, already knows what his own passion is: fish! Issa often skips school to work at the Nagahama fish market, and the two boys hang out near the ocean almost every day. When Nagisa suspects that Issa has a girlfriend, it turns his world upside down. Is he in love with his best friend? Could his best friend possibly like him back?
